description:
ezPDF Reader is the only PDF viewer with the embedded multimedia file playing capability feature in AppStore. It also supports the Annotations and PDF Form Filling.

For iPad Users, please download the iPad version in AppStore.

For more information, http://www.twitter.com/ezpdf 
 
TTS In-App Purchase Feature is working NOW. 
FYI, if the device is in silent mode, it only works with earphone. Please turn off the silent mode to hear from speaker.

● Customized Viewing 

Clearly presented without the fluff, documents appear as they would on your PC, but customized to fit your mobile device's screen. Scanned and text based PDFs are all supported, including JPEG2000 and JBIG2 compression. Select Text Reflow, Fit to Text Column, Copy and paste text in PDF view and bookmark as you go. 

● PDF Form Filler 

If the PDF file is designed with form filling feature, you can simply type in the form field and apply marks on buttons. Good for application forms, school tests, and contracts. Fill out your Tax Form with ezPDF Reader. Fill out the contract form, sign at the bottom, and send via email from the file manager. 

● Multimedia PDF Viewer - Audio and Video 

ezPDF Reader is designed specifically for PDF documents and contents, but also able to play multimedia files embedded into PDF.  (Multimedia file format must be compatible to your iOS device) Perfect solution for PDF based audio/video-enabled eBooks. For the Multimedia Cookbook based on our technology, search for "Celebration at the Sarayi" from the App Store.

● Annotation Features on PDF 

Useful tool to add text in text box and sticky notes; highlight, underline, or cross out texts; draw lines, arrows, rectangles, ovals and freehand drawings. Add memo, change color / thickness, resize and move them around as you like. All these comments are compatible with Adobe® Acrobat®. (PC or Mac version) 

* Important - In order to use annotations and PDF Form features, you need to change the Viewing mode to "Slow/More" from the settings.

1. Functions for PDF Viewing 

PDF Form to fill in, check buttons, and choose from a list. 
Play embedded multimedia files of audio and video files (Must be iOS compatible) 
Annotation features - Apply highlight, underline or cross-over for the selected text. Add Sticky Note, Oval, Rectangle, Line, Free Text, Image. 
Embedded hyperlinks are live (Go To Page and URLs) 
Smart zooming by double-tapping to fit block width 
Pinch and Double Tap - Zoom IN/Out
Text Selection or Markup Annotation and then Copy, Web Search, or send to Email
Thumbnail Image View 
Text reflow with font size, color & font style (bold & italic) 
Night reading mode supported for PDF view, Text Reflow
Text search and highlighted result 
Open standard password-protected PDF files 
Jump to a specific page by its page number 
Outlines 
Bookmarks 
Landscape view 
Annotations list/reply view 
Annotations import/export/email 
Page scroll vertical/horizontal 
Page read direction from left to right/from right to left 
Page Crop
Page Slide Show
PDF File Attachment

2. Support for other file formats 

Supports Microsoft Office, Audio (mp3, wav, aac, aa, aiff), Video (mp4, mov, mpv, 3gp), Images, Zipped Images, Text and HTML, Annotations XML files 

3. Functions for File Management 

File List View 
Sorting by Name/ Date/ File Size 
File Search by File Name
List of the Recently-Viewed PDF Files
Various File Transfer to Device – USB Transfer via iTunes, WiFi Connection, URL Link,  Download 
Interaction with clouding services - G-Docs, Dropbox
Convenient File Management  - Folder Creation/Copy/Cut/Paste/Delete/Rename 

4. Supported Language - English/Korean

We also provide a PC based PDF tool program for FREE.
 - Add hyperlinks and embed audio/video files.
Download Program from PC : http://www.unidocs.com/products/ezPDFMultimediaPDFMaker.zip
Redeem Code : 3e2d666f79
User Guide : http://bit.ly/Wh1eCt
trackCensoredName: ezPDF Reader: PDF Reader, Annotator & Form Filler
